com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.extension

Class WidgetExtensionManagement<E extends WidgetExtension<E,M>,M extends WidgetExtensionManagement<E,M>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.extension.WidgetExtensionManagement<E,M>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of the widget extension
    M - the type of the management that handles the widget extension type. This type parameter ensures that management and extension are tied together.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentTypeWidgetExtensionManagement, CPLNoteActionsProviderManagement, CPLNoteItemTemplateProviderManagement, CPLNoteMetaDataProviderManagement

    public abstract class WidgetExtensionManagement<E extends WidgetExtension<E,M>,M extends WidgetExtensionManagement<E,M>>
extends Object
    Class that manages a specific type of widget extensions.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WidgetExtensionManagement() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addExtension(E extension)
      Add a new widget extension to this manager.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WidgetExtensionManagement

        public WidgetExtensionManagement()

    • Method Detail

      • addExtension

        public void addExtension(E extension)
        Add a new widget extension to this manager. The extension will be added according to its order value. In case there is already an extension with the order value the new is added after the existing.
        Parameters:
        extension - the extension to add

      • getExtensions

        protected List<E> getExtensions()
        Returns:
        the registered extensions ordered by their order value (highest first). The returned collection shouldn't be modified directly, use the add and remove methods instead.

      • removeExtension

        public void removeExtension(E extension)
        Remove a previously registered extension.
        Parameters:
        extension - the extension to remove
